enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve creating or manipulating JSON objects, which can be used to prepare input for getJSONArray.
addKeyValue can be used to prepare the JSONObject that might be converted to an ArrayList for getJSONArray.
getJSONStringValue can be used to extract specific values from JSON strings that might be used in the preparation of the ArrayList for getJSONArray.
getJSONIntValue can be used to extract specific integer values from JSON strings that might be used in the preparation of the ArrayList for getJSONArray.
